references.paper_title: Data Shapley: Equitable Valuation of Data for Machine Learning
references.reason: This paper introduces Data Shapley, a foundational method for data valuation that heavily influences the current work's approach.

references.paper_title: Data-OOB: Out-of-bag estimate as a simple and efficient data value
references.reason: This paper proposes Data-OOB, a key technique that is directly extended and improved upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: A Unified Approach to Interpreting Model Predictions
references.reason: This paper introduces SHAP values, a widely used method for feature attribution, which provides theoretical grounding for the cell-level analysis in this paper.

references.paper_title: BadNets: Identifying Vulnerabilities in the Machine Learning Model Supply Chain
references.reason: This paper introduces the BadNets attack, a significant data poisoning attack method used in experimental evaluation of the proposed method.
This paper introduces Random Forests, which is the basis of the subset bagging model used in the proposed algorithm.
